articles.description: Sydney and Brisbane motorists urged to fill up before petrol price hike
articles.content: Brisbane and Sydney motorists are being urged to fill up now as petrol prices are set to soar before the start of the weekend. Fuel watchers at CommSec believe bowser prices in both major capital cit… [+1244 chars]
